subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: For some of this year’s Davis Cup teams, like Israel’s and South Korea’s, the wait to rejoin the World Group has often seemed interminable. But the Americans cannot quite believe they are being asked to play again so soon.
snippet: For some of this year’s Davis Cup teams, like Israel’s and South Korea’s, the wait to rejoin the World Group has often seemed interminable. But the Americans cannot quite believe they are being asked to play again so soon.
